description: Customer dataset containing essential information such as names, contact details, account opening dates, and country codes, enabling insights into customer demographics and engagement.

metadata.description: Unique identifier for each customer in the dataset.
The first name of the customer.
Contact number of the customer; Format is a standard phone number.
Email address of the customer; Used for communication and account-related notifications.
ISO code representing the country of the customer.
Date when the customer account was opened; Format is YYYY-MM-DD.
Flags indicating the status or special conditions of the customer's account; typically used for categorization.
